name: Feedback pointer 2
description:
B : reset background
S : Make the pointer bigger. 
A : make the pointer smaller. 

This is the second of a series of interactive art piece made with shaders where you can use the pointer to draw with feedback.
 The idea is to show different ways of how to use feedback as a creative tool. 
This one in particular has makes a strange palet and some kind of glitch effect. the displacement is controlled according the pointer position
